original_text:
“Can you lift up your voice to the clouds,
    that a flood of waters may cover you?
korean_text: 네가 목소리를 구름에까지 높여 넘치는 물이 네게 덮이게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Can you lift up your voice to the clouds
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 구름을 향해 네 목소리를 높일 수 있느냐?

sentences.original_text: that a flood of waters may cover you?
